articles.author: Kelly Wynne
articles.title: Coronavirus Update: Map Shows More Than 71,000 Confirmed Cases in 26 Countries
articles.description: In the United States, 14 passengers who were evacuated from a Japanese cruise ship tested positive for the virus Monday.
articles.content:
The number of people infected by coronavirus continues to rise with the Health Organization (WHO) reporting 71,000 confirmed cases of the virus in 26 countries by Monday morning. Of them, 70,548 cases are located in China, according to WHO weekend updates.
C… [+2233 chars]

articles.author: Brendan Cole
articles.title: Coronavirus Is 'Threatening the Future of Globalization,' Economist Says
articles.description: Imports to Korea from China have had the biggest fall since the Asia financial crisis in 1999, with China's GDP set to plummet this year.
articles.content:
Coronavirus could also spread economic contagion from China over the long term, an economist has warned, as experts assess the financial fallout from the illness that has killed at least 1,700 people and sickened 70,000.
The extended shutdown in China over t… [+3232 chars]

articles.author: Soo Kim
articles.title: Fears Rise Over Coronavirus as American Cruise Passenger Is Diagnosed After Previously Showing No Symptoms
articles.description: Authorities are scrambling to track the other passengers who were cleared for travel and allowed to disembark the MS Westerdam cruise ship after showing no signs of illness.
articles.content: Fears over the COVID-19 coronavirus spreading to more countries have escalated after an American cruise passenger, who previously showed no symptoms, was diagnosed with the virus on Sunday after disembarking the MS Westerdam, a cruise ship from the Holland Am… [+6238 chars]

articles.author: Kashmira Gander
articles.title: American Cruise Ship Passengers Tested Positive for Coronavirus During Evacuation From Quarantined Vessel
articles.description: Hundreds of U.S. citizens were removed from the Diamond Princess cruise ship on Sunday.
articles.content:
Over a dozen Americans who were removed from a cruise ship quarantined over the deadly new coronavirus have been allowed on an evacuation aircraft after testing positive for the bug called COVID-19, according to U.S. officials.
On Sunday, the U.S. Department… [+4335 chars]
